message: Let's split it 50/50, a fair start!
You can't get away with taking all the money, can you?
You're being greedy, Bob! I'll give you a quarter, but I'm taking the rest!
You're being generous, but I'll take it!
You're getting desperate, Bob! I'll give you a bit more, but not much!
You're getting greedy, but I'll give you a chance to reconsider!
You're getting desperate, Bob! I'll give you a tiny piece of the pie, but I'm taking most of it!
You're not getting any younger, Alice. Time to make a real offer
You're running out of time, Bob! I'll give you a small crumb, but I'm taking the rest!
You're getting close to the edge, Alice. Don't push it!
You're almost out of time, Bob! I'll give you a tiny morsel, but I'm taking the rest!
This is my final offer. Take it or leave it!
